page.title: 18VILLAGE LIFE CHITTLEHAMPTON
page.content: The ultimate in village cooperation was carried to its friendly conclusion recently in Chittlehampton. The butcher retired, so the assistant butcher took over the general store and the people in the general store moved to the Post Office and the lady from the Post Office still works there. Confused? The local butcher retired after running the shop for 30 years. This was the ideal opportunity for his assistant of 27 years a Chittlehampton man born and bred to achieve his ambition. He took over the general store and added a butchery department while the general store owners moved 50 yards along the street to the Post Office. "We have all been working together to be able to stay in the village".
